title: Your feet
creator_credit: Kenneth Carter, Hindle Marriott Edgar and World Wide Pictures
brief_description: The anatomy of the foot and the essentials of foot hygiene, showing the importance of choosing well-fitting shoes, particularly while the feet are still growing.
